definition: to chat with a low voice
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
in a whisper/in a low voice (idiom)
whispering in a low voice (idiom); murmuring

sentences.english: Through the sadness of all things I hear the crooning of the Eternal Mother.
sentences.chinese: 在万物的哀愁里，我听到了“永恒母亲”的柔声细语。

sentences.english: Beauty is of soft whisperings . She speaks in our spirit.
sentences.chinese: 美是柔声细语，她在我们的心灵中讲话。

sentences.english: Thee swallow twittering from the straw-built shed.
sentences.chinese: 茅草棚上燕子的细语呢喃。

sentences.english: I can hear a knot of people whisper in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 我能听见一小群人在隔壁低声细语。

sentences.english: Be strong and confident and learn to speak softly.
sentences.chinese: 要坚强，有自信，并且学会轻声细语的说话。

sentences.english: When I listen to the ocean, it will be your whispers;
sentences.chinese: 当我聆听大海时，会发现那是你的低声细语。

sentences.english: It sounds as though you are lamenting, a butterfly cooing like a dove.
sentences.chinese: 你听起来像在悲叹，一只如鸽般喁喁细语的蝴蝶。

sentences.english: Thieves are afraid of being overheard even when they are talking in a whisper.
sentences.chinese: 做贼的就连在低声细语时也怕叫人听见。

sentences.english: Are they sensitive to the slightest whisper of something that comes unexpectedly?
sentences.chinese: 它们对不期而来的极其低微的细语都很敏感吗？

sentences.english: Rubin, like most engineers, is usually soft-spoken.
sentences.chinese: 和大多数工程师一样，鲁宾通常轻声细语。

sentences.english: They get up low whisper, no let me toss and turn restlessly not go to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他们起床时低声的细语，没有让我辗转反侧睡不下去。

sentences.english: The whisper was there, and I rarely commanded his silence.
sentences.chinese: 我心里有个人在悄言细语，但我几乎没能命令他安静。

sentences.english: All the whispers, the warnings so clear.
sentences.chinese: 尽管所有这些低声细语和警示是如此的清晰。

sentences.english: Don't let your will roar when your power only whispers.
sentences.chinese: 当你的力量只能低声细语时不要让你的愿望咆哮。

definition: in a whisper/in a low voice (idiom)
whispering in a low voice (idiom); murmuring
to discuss in whispered tones/whispered conversation
looking up expectantly/speaking softly (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [yu2 yu2])
to whisper in sb's ear/a whisper
in a fine voice (idiom); softly spoken
